features.title: Beautiful New Tab Dashboard
features.description: Transform your new tab page into a stunning dashboard. Your new tab dashboard becomes the perfect starting point for every browsing session, combining aesthetics with functionality.

features.title: Powerful Sessions Widget
features.description: The heart of Sesh - a comprehensive interface for managing all your tabs, windows, and bookmarks. Available as a dashboard widget or browser extension (Alt/Option + S) for instant access.

features.title: Drag & Drop Tab Management
features.description: Effortlessly organize your browsing with intuitive drag and drop. Move tabs between windows, drop them into bookmark folders, and reorganize your entire workspace with simple mouse gestures.

features.title: Advanced Folder Customization
features.description: Customize bookmark folders with custom icons, reordering, pinning, and sync options, far beyond what you can do with the default browser. Create a personalized organization system that matches your workflow and visual preferences.

features.title: Pinned Bookmarks Access
features.description: Quick access to your most important bookmarks with the pinned bookmarks widget. Keep your essential links always visible and organized on your new tab page.

features.title: Flexible Widget System
features.description: Build your perfect dashboard with customizable widgets: analog/digital clocks, countdown timers, quick links, search bars, text notes, and more. Resize and position each widget exactly where you want it.

features.title: Smart Widgets
features.description: Find anything instantly with the powerful search widget (supports Google, DuckDuckGo, Grok, ChatGPT, Youtube etc.). Save your favorite links with the links widget.

features.title: Themes for your style
features.description: Choose from beautiful themes including Ninja, Geometry, Zen, Earth, and custom colors. Each theme provides a unique aesthetic.
